attributes.action: To re-establish face to face GP consultations steering away from e-Consult.
attributes.additional_details: Because individuals have no say, no power and no representation.
attributes.background:
Force GPs to return to normal procedures that were in place pre-pandemic.

This would prevent many conditions developing in patients that they are at present refusing to see face to face

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Create a legal right for patients to receive timely face-to-face GP appointments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
